cards.heading: Who can watch this live chat?
cards.content:
The replay is exclusively for Lever supporting subscribers. Click here to subscribe.

If you are already a supporting subscriber, but still see a “This post is for subscribers only” notice below, click here to log in to this website and then reload this page.

cards.html: powered by Crowdcast

sections: On Thursday 3/24 at 7 pm ET (4 pm PT),
kicked off its new monthly happy hour series, where supporting subscribers get to chat with our reporters and editors about anything and everything. David Sirota,
’s founder and editor in chief, led the chat from Los Angeles, where he is attending the Academy Awards as an Oscar nominee for
These happy hours will occur every month, allowing our supporting subscribers to interact in real-time with our staff about news of the day and to help us plan our future coverage.
supporting subscribers can watch a replay of the live chat using the embedded Crowdcast window below.
